attributes.action: Ditch the EU Withdrawal Agreement and the linked Political Statement.
attributes.additional_details:
The EU Withdrawal Agreement and the linked Political Statement is not Brexit.
It is Brexit in name only.
Unless the EU Withdrawal Agreement and the linked Political Statement are ditched completely, the UK will remain under the control of the EU for evermore and that is not what the 17.4m voted for in the EU Referendum.
If the UK is to restore entirely its sovereignty, the only way forward is to leave with 'No Deal'.
Then the UK can negotiate its future relationship with the EU as a free, independent and proud country.
attributes.background:
EU Withdrawal Agreement & linked Political Statement isn't Brexit.
It is Brexit in name only.
Unless the EU Withdrawal Agreement & the linked Political Statement are ditched completely, UK will remain under the control of the EU for evermore & that is not what the 17.4m voted for in EU Referendum.
